title: Person In Manual Wheelchair Medium Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Wheelchair User Medium Light Skin Tone
description: A person using a manual wheelchair, depicted with a medium-light skin tone. This emoji represents mobility, accessibility, and individuals who use wheelchairs for transportation.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person in a manual wheelchair emoji features a figure with a friendly medium-light skin tone, confidently seated and propelled forward. Apple's design language brings a sense of smooth texture and realistic lighting to the wheelchair itself, emphasizing its functional form with subtle highlights. The person's posture appears upright and engaged, embodying independence and accessibility, a thoughtful representation of mobility and participation on Apple devices.
